name: Blood Embrace
description: A weapon created by Bishop Otto in imitation of " Oath of Judah. " Forged from a huge supply of " Soul Steel , " the weapon is also implanted with the cores of three emperor-level Honkai beasts . . .

name: Oath of Judah
description: Witness of Pledge

name: Al Chan's Candy
description: Miss Theresa , what would you like for present ? Chocolate ? Apple candy ? Or. . me ?

name: Lightning Angel
description: A cross-shaped weapon developed by the Schicksal. The core of emperor - level Honkai beast Ramiel has been implanted inside it , making it capable of unleashing powerful lightning bolts .

name: Fire Spirit Type-11
description: A pistol designed especially for Valkyries by the St. 7308 Research Center . An F-28 Honkai energy engine is installed in it . The excited particles produced by the core go through a transition when hitting the target , producing a huge

name: Fire Oath
description: A cross-shaped weapon designed especially for Theresa by the St. 7308 Research Center . The cross converts Honkai energy into flame energy , which aids Valkyries in their battles .

name: Penetrating Bullets Launcher
description: A small Soviet-produced catapult for shells. Though it has become much lighter than it used to be , it still weighs a whopping 235 kg . Only that one ridiculously strong Maiden would ever run around carrying it on her back . . .

name: Ice Oath
description: A cross-shaped weapon designed especially for Theresa by the St. 7308 Research Center . The cross converts Honkai energy into freezing energy , which aids Valkyries in their battles .

name: Cross Ice Bullets
description: An adapted cross-shaped self - defense machine gun , which fires ice bullets that freeze the enemy. It is more powerful than the average cross , though apparently Theresa still prefers to just throw it at the enemy . . .

name: Cross
description: A cross-shaped self - defense machine gun developed by the Schicksal. It can be used to fire silver bullets that are effective against Honkai beasts , though apparently Theresa prefers simply throwing it at the enemy .

name: Colt Anaconda EX
description: A series of large double-action revolvers designed and produced by the Colt Company. With newly fitted barrels , they've become the most accurate model of all . 44 revolvers produced by Colt .

name: The Betrayer's Greatsword
description: Betrayer's Counter

name: Desert Eagle
description: Produced by the IMI Company , this weapon comes with three calibers: 357 Magnum , 44 Magnum , and 50 AE. It can be easily modified through combining different barrels , actions , and magazines .

name: Schwert Gewehr
description: Magnetical Blade

name: Blood Dance
description: Reborn

name: PUSP45
description: Revolvers designed by the H & K Company specially for the military and law enforcement departments in the US. With a . 45 ACP caliber cartridge , it is extremely accurate and reliable in its performance .

name: 7th Sacred Relic
description: Sacred Rule

name: Nidhogg's Claws
description: Death Dissever

name: Alloy Godfather's Greatsword
description: A weapon forged by the Schicksal with self-developed fire - type Honkai energy ores to replicate the Godfather's Greatsword. Its Honkai force is almost as powerful as that of the real Godfather ' s Greatsword .

name: Alloy Betrayer's Greatsword
description: A circulated version of the Betrayer's Greatsword , produced by the Mikoyan Design Bureau as an imitation piece. It retains 90 % of the functions of the Betrayer ' s Greatsword .

name: King Cobra
description: The broadsword that belonged to Regona , captain of the late Valkyrie trooper squad. Regona was Himeko's instructor once upon a time . However , she was slain along with other squad members by someone in a Honkai battle

name: lon Resonance
description: A greatsword developed by the ME Corp under a secret request by the leader of the Anti-Entropy alliance. It unleashes lightning bolts on surrounding enemies . Who exactly is this secret weapon meant for . . . ?

name: Hybrid Type-27
description: A hybrid greatsword , it boasts the piercing function of knight swords , the chopping function of a slaying blade , and the easy-to - use characteristic of a broadsword. Only a powerful warrior could maneuver it skillfully .

name: Hybrid Type-16
description: A hybrid greatsword , it boasts the piercing function of knight swords , the chopping function of a slaying blade , and the easy-to - use characteristic of a broadsword. In the hands of an experienced warrior , it is extremely deadly .

name: Nitro Crystal
description: A greatsword developed by the ME Corp under a secret request by the leader of the Anti-Entropy alliance. It is capable of freezing enemies that it hits . Not even Kukuria , ME's current CEO , knows about its existence .

name: Energy Greatsword
description: A standard greatsword designed by St. 7308 Research Center especially for Valkyries . Based on an old greatsword model , this sword boasts increased Honkai energy powers . The blade gleams in the purple shade of Honkai energy .

name: Nuclear PRI
description: A broadsword produced by the Mikoyan Design Bureau. The miniature Honkai energy furnace on the hilt is remodeled from an ancient Soviet Union nuclear furnace .

name: Greatsword
description: Murata Himeko's favorite greatsword. It may be a bit outdated and not as powerful as it could be , but it has been by Himeko ' s side even before she became a Valkyrie .

name: Lurker's Cannon
description: One Punch [SP Cost: 18] ( Cooldown : 12 sec Smashes ground multiple times using its mechanical arms , knocking back enemies and stunning them with each blow dealing physical damage equal to 120 % of ATK and stunning enemies for 2. 55 sec . This skill grants a short movement speed boost upon casting .

name: Chiyou Cannon
description: Dark Ice [SP Cost: 25] [ Cooldown : 20 sec ] Shoots an icy shock wave , freezing surrounding enemies with Dark Ice. Deals 960 ice damage every 0 . 9 sec to enemies trapped in Dark Ice and recovers skill caster's HP by 100 . Dark Ice lasts for 4 sec .

name: Ymir's Wrist
description: Part of the " Gods " weapon series , produced by the Schicksal using " Soul Steel ". Honkai energy is used to strengthen the cannonballs , making every one of them as powerful as the iron fists of the giants in Nordic mythology .

name: Project Bunny 19C
description: Quantum Outbreak

name: Briareus PRI
description: Time Tran

name: 5th Sacred Relic
description: Cluster Bomb Generates extra bullets upon explosion. The three stages of charging generates 2 , 4 , and 9 extra

name: Alloy Devourer's Laser
description: A circulated version of the Devourer's Laser , produced by the Mikoyan Design Bureau as an imitation piece. It is used to fight non-ultimate - scale Honkai incidents . Its Honkai force is as powerful as that of the Devourer ' s Laser .

name: Frost Rain
description: Chill Escape Shoots frost air when attacked , decreasing surrounding enemies'Attack Speed and Movement

name: Cathode Type-09
description: A beam cannon developed by Kukuria , ME Corp's current CEO. It is capable of separating cathodes from Honkai energy particles and sending them through a vibration device to form light beams , which can paralyze the target .

name: Raider Missiles
description: A split missile designed by the Mikoyan Design Bureau. The cannonballs come with Honkai adsorption chains , which are capable of automatically locking on to the target and dealing heavy damage . On the cannonballs , a tiny

name: Cathode Type-07
description: Frost Trail [SP Cost: 7] ( Cooldown : 20 sec ] Decreases movement and attack speeds of surrounding enemies bv 80 % !

name: Markov Type C
description: Speedy Clockwork [SP Cost: 12] ( Cooldown : 20 sec ] Enhances own

name: MiG-7
description: This weapon utilizes superconductive energy-storing current , created through superconductive technology , to produce high - intensity lasers which can be used to fire oriented laser beams , dealing direct damage on the target

name: MiG-13
description: A rocket launcher that is capable of fitting and firing multiple rockets at the same time. It was developed by the Soviet Union in as early as 1933 , and equipped by the Red Army . It was used for the first time for practical battle

name: MiG-11
description: The development of this weapon began in the mid-50s. It is capable of launching weapons up to 523 kg , with an aircraft Mach number of 0 . 85 , a practical flying height of 16000 m , and a maximum range of 620 km .

name: SU-30 Cannon
description: Aims and fires directly. The trajectory of this cannon is low and extended , while the velocity of its muzzle is quite high . It is one of the main cannon types used for ground artillery . The caliber is on the small side ( under 75 mm ) .

name: Wind Wielder
description: 5. 0 % chance of increasing Movement Speed by

name: Gluttony Scimitar
description: A weapon produced by ME Corp through extracting the ice-and - curing - type core from the body of Honkai beast Gaņeśa and using Honkai bio - energy technology. The core is melded with a special Honkai - adaptive alloy to create an

name: Ice Epiphyllum
description: Increases elemental damage by 15. 0 % . Receives an enerav charge every 5 sec causing the next attack to

name: Vorpal Sword Type-11
description: Bronya's Project Bunny 19C is fitted with modules that are capable of creating mini-black holes by consuming Honkai energy. Through reverse engineering of this module , the ME Corp has managed to create a tachi with similar

name: Plasma Kagehide
description: Deals an additional 24 ice damage upon hitting the target .

name: Raikiri
description: A samurai sword developed by the ME Corp Headquarters using data acquired from Project-MEI. The powerful EM field formed around the hilt protects the wielder , like a shield of the Lightning Empress .

name: MagStorm
description: A samurai sword developed by the ME Corp Headquarters using data acquired from Project-MEI. When the Honkai energy particles in the EM field explode , the impact is almost as destructive as a blow from the Third God Bringer .

name: Alloy Wind Wielder
description: A blade batch-produced by ME Corp with bionic technology , utilizing part of the Honkai characteristics of the Wind Wielder. Its Honkai force is almost as powerful as that of the Wind Wielder .

name: Endergonic Tachi
description: A katana designed by the St. 7308 Research Center especially for Valkyries . It changes attack attributes according to the type of Honkai energy that goes with each Valkyrie , in order to help each Valkyrie achieve her ultimate

name: Alloy Gluttony Scimitar
description: A blade batch-produced by ME Corp with bionic technology , utilizing part of the Honkai characteristics of the Gluttony Scimitar. Its Honkai force is almost as powerful as that of the Gluttony Scimitar .

name: Xuanyuan: Katana
description: To aid Mei , who was swallowed by Chiyou , the servant of Jixuanyuan utilized fragments of the Xuanyuan Sword to power up the pulse katana and granting it the ability to control ice .

name: Proto Katana
description: Produced with the Muramasa series as reference. It's one of the Honkai weapon prototypes that very few people know about . It grows up at its master ' s side , and may be upgraded to 4-star rarity as far as current records are

name: Pulse Katana Type-17
description: A EM pulse sword designed by Raiden Ryoma , former CEO of ME Corp himself. The purpose of the design is to slow down and imprison enemies instead of killing them . Why did he design this sword . . . ?

name: Hell Thunder
description: A saber designed especially for Valkyries by the St. 7308 Research Center . Honkai energy flows in the blade , and when it is swung the Honkai energy is released , creating powerful shockwaves . The blade is shaped like a rice

name: Lightning Soul
description: A saber designed especially for Valkyries by the St. 7308 Research Center . A huge number of Honkai particles are attached to the surface of the blade . The blade is in a unique shape , not to enhance its performance but to

name: Rosefinch
description: Designed and forged by the Muramasa family. The blade is forged from an unknown alloy , completely black normally but gleams in a curious orange-red color when in contact with blood . So far , no one knows exactly what material has

name: Muramasa Bloodlust
description: As members of the Tokugawa family died under the Muramasa one by one , the sword became know as an unlucky omen , called a " demon blade " by many. Legend has it that only the pure , untainted passion of young girls

name: Seishuu Muramasa
description: An ancient samurai sword from Japan. Legend has it that it was forged by the Muramasa family from Ise . Renowned since its first version , this weapon is said to be the representative of all Japanese samurai swords .

name: Horikawa Kunihiro
description: The beloved sword of Hijikata Toshizo of the Shinzen-gumi , a true masterpiece forged by the famed swordsmith Hyuga Sumikuni from Kyushu. Hijikata cherished this sword and kept it on him wherever he went .

name: Light and Shadow
description: Bursts frost air when a basic attack ( including

name: The Energy Leaper
description: Increases own Attack Speed by 80. 0 % and Critical

name: Hyper Railgun
description: Hand cannons developed by the ME Corp Headquarters based on the test data results from Project-MEI 9 years ago. It successfully compresses a huge number of Honkai energy particles in an EM field , drastically strengthening

name: Blaze Destroyer
description: Tanition

name: Artemis'Guardian
description: A pistol produced by the Schicksal 16 years ago. The words " May the moonlight be with you , Kiana . Love , Siegfried , Cecilia , and Theresa " are engraved on it in tiny text .

name: Holy Guns-Kallen
description: A pistol produced a long time ago by someone in the Schicksal in remembrance of a certain Valkyrie. It now lies silently in the depths of the Schicksal Headquarters .

name: Silver Cleaver
description: Execute

name: Fire Angel
description: A cross-shaped weapon developed by the Schicksal. The core of emperor - level Honkai beast Raziel has been implanted inside it , making it capable of spewing destructive flames .

name: Proto Pistols
description: Produced with the USP series as reference. It's one of the Honkai weapon prototypes that very few people know about . It grows up at its master ' s side , and may be upgraded to 4-star rarity as far as current records are

description: A small Soviet-produced catapult for firebombs. Though it has become much lighter than it used to be , it still weighs a whopping 250 kg . Only that one ridiculously strong Maiden would ever run around carrying it on her back . . .

name: Water Spirit Type-/
description: A pistol designed especially for Valkyries by the St. 7308 Research Center . An I-30 Honkai energy engine is installed in it . The condensed particles produced by the core are used to strengthen the bullets and effectively create

name: Ghostslayer Nagamitsu
description: Sharp Edge

name: Jingwei's Wings
description: Part of the " Gods " weapon series , produced by the Schicksal using special " Soul Steel " collected from the " Nine Realms ". The flaming wings on the bullets signify the blessings of the ancient mystic winged beast , Jingwei .

name: Dragon Spine
description: A greatsword forged by the Anti-Entropy using the marrow extracted from the ancient Honkai beast , Chiyou. Known as the " Dragon " by many , Chiyou was an enormous creature whose body still lies sleeping somewhere in the depths of

name: RM1911
description: A standard battle weapon used by the US Army in the Persian Gulf War. It comes with 7 Colt pistol cartridges and has an effective firing range of 50 meters .

name: Sunfire Greatsword
description: The most powerful greatsword ever to have been made by the St. 7308 Research Center . " Soul Steel " , a material leftover from the last century's civilization was not used Instead , this greatsword is completely manufactured by

name: Proto Greatsword
description: Produced with the Valkyrie greatsword as its reference , it's a Honkai weapon prototype that very few know about. It matures along with its master and may be upgraded to 4-star rarity as far as current records show .

name: Vanguard
description: There was once a trooper squad of Valkyries , in which every member carried a broadsword and fought at the front lines of the battles against the Honkai. Himeko used to be part of this team as well 6 years ago . . .

name: Devourer's Laser
description: Devouring Impact [SP Cost: 25] ( Cooldown : 20 sec ] Releases psychic shock using mechanical arms , generating multiple explosions. Each explosion deals 214 fire damage and ignites enemies , dealing 134 fire damage every

name: Tyr Wrist
description: Wargod's Bombardment [SP Cost: 19] ( Cooldown : 9 sec ] Instantly releases a 3-hit combo bombardment. Bombardment bleeds enemies that are hit , dealing 315 physical damage every 0 . 5 sec for 7 sec .

name: Core Evoker Delta
description: EM Overload

name: Cyclops PRI
description: Death Explosion

name: Proto Cannon
description: Temporary Overclocking [SP Cost: 8] [ Cooldown : 15 sec ] Enhances own weapon , increasing physical damage of basic attacks ( including combo and charged attacks ) by 32 % for 5 sec

name: Markov Type A
description: A heavy Honkai energy weapon produced by the Mikoyan Design Bureau. It was once a standard Soviet weapon , but now comes with a Honkai energy crystal shard . Its technology system is not of Schicksal nor of Anti-Entropy .

name: Fury Cannon
description: A heavy cannon produced by the Soviet Union. A field weapon best fitted for attacking hidden targets and ground targets . It works with Molotov cocktails , grenades , propaganda bombs and various other types of bombs . The

name: SU-22 Howitzer
description: A field weapon best fitted for attacking hidden targets and ground targets. It works with Molotov cocktails , grenades , propaganda bombs and various other types of bombs . The cannon's caliber is 105 mm .

name: Sakura Blossom
description: Round Dance Upon attacking a target , there's a 100. 0 % chance of unleashing a blade wave , dealing physical damage equal to 200 . 0 % of ATK . Blade waves deal an

name: Void Blade
description: Energy Devourer

name: High Frequency Cutter
description: With the data obtained from experiments on Seele , the Anti-Entropy has achieved huge breakthroughs in the research of the movements of micro - particles , and in turn used what they learned to develop this katana , which slices

name: Phoenix Sword
description: A limited-edition weapon. One of the " Phoenix " twin weapon set . The other half of the set , counterpart of Mei's Phoenix Sword , is Kiana ' s Feng Spear .

name: Crystal Edge
description: Snowy white crystal flowers bloom on the battlefield of the Second Honkai War. The St . 7308 Research Center used these flowers to forge this reverse-edged sword , which comes with magical powers that are capable of freezing

name: Dominator's Pistol
description: Fury Dominator

name: Willow
description: Produced by the St. 7308 Research Center , combining ancient God's Land sword forging crafts and the most advanced Honkai technology . Its willow-leaf shape makes it extremely effective for slaying and slicing actions .

name: Amemura Bloodlust
description: When slaying someone with this weapon , dew will spew out from the blade as if to wash away the blood. This may be the tears of regret of the sword , in an attempt to cleanse itself from its sins .

name: Hurricane Revolver
description: A weapon produced by the Schicksal with metal containing ice-type Honkai energy that has been affected by the fourth God Bringer. The Honkai magnetic field at the muzzle causes the bullet to spin wildly in its path , causing

name: Fafnir Flame
description: Part of the " Gods " weapon series , produced by the Schicksal using " Soul Steel. " It produces powerful explosive particles through the atomic fission of Honkai energy , capable of unleashing a terrifying force that rivals

name: Pulse Katana Type-19
description: A EM pulse sword designed by Raiden Ryoma , former CEO of ME Corp himself. The purpose of the design is to allow even the average person to fight with Honkai energy . Why did he design this sword . . . ?

name: Alloy Hurricane Revolver
description: A gun batch-produced by the Schicksal with self - developed ice alloys in imitation of the Hurricane Revolver. Its Honkai force is almost as powerful as that of the Hurricane Revolver .

name: Water Spirit Type-| |
description: A pistol designed especially for Valkyries by the St. 7308 Research Center . An 1-32 Honkai energy engine is installed in it . The condensed particles produced by the core suck away the heat on the target on contact , causing the target

name: Godfather's Greatsword
description: A weapon produced by the Schicksal with an unidentified ore containing fire-type Honkai energy , dropped by the Godfather. Honkai particles are entwined on the blade generating a destructive amount of heat .

name: Colt Peacemaker
description: A double-action revolver designed and produced by the Colt Company. It works with 44 Special , 44 Magnum , and 45 Colt bullets .

name: PUSP EX
description: A new and improved version of the USP45 , designed by the H & K Company according to the requirements of the US Army Special Forces in order to deal with large-scale public safety threats .

name: Fusion Sword EX
description: A broadsword produced by the Mikoyan Design Bureau. The enhanced miniature Honkai energy furnace on the hilt is capable of dealing damage as powerful as a small nuclear explosion the moment it is activated .

name: Alloy Lurker's Cannon
description: ( SP Cost: 12] ( Cooldown : 9 sec Smashes ground using mechanical arms. Knocks enemies back multiple times , each time dealing physical damage equal to 90 % of ATK .

name: The Dark Crusher
description: A cross-shaped weapon designed by the Mikoyan Design Bureau. When deployed , it automatically attacks the nearby areas , annihilating everything in the vicinity .

name: 3rd Sacred Relic
description: A light multi-functional melee combat weapon from the last era of civilization , excavated from Lake Baikal by the Schicksal. It seems to utilize a sort of God Bringer core material and its composition is practically impossible to
